section.section: An applicant for a peddler license shall pay to the clerk the applicable license fee.

If the applicant is a foot peddler, the license fee is:
in Baltimore City, $200;
in St. Mary's County, the amount set by the County Commissioners, by resolution; and
in any other county, $100.

If the applicant is a one horse peddler, the license fee is:
in Baltimore City, $250;
in St. Mary's County, the amount set by the County Commissioners, by resolution; and
in any other county, $150.

If the applicant is a two horse peddler, the license fee is:
in Baltimore City, $300;
in St. Mary's County, the amount set by the County Commissioners, by resolution; and
in any other county, $200.

If the applicant is a motor vehicle peddler, the license fee is:
in Baltimore City, $500;
in St. Mary's County, the amount set by the County Commissioners, by resolution; and
in any other county, $300; but
In Harford County, an applicant for a peddler license must have the written permission of the owner or lessee of the property where the applicant will do business.
